# Copilot Instructions for MCP Server Demo

This file contains instructions for GitHub Copilot to follow when working on this MCP server project.

## General Guidelines

- Always keep the README up to date to list features, files and their use, and commands run to build everything
- Make sure to create useful VS tasks to handle common commands

## MCP SDK References

For building MCP servers, refer to the official MCP documentation and SDKs:

- [MCP TypeScript SDK Documentation](https://github.com/modelcontextprotocol/typescript-sdk)
- [MCP Specification](https://modelcontextprotocol.io/specification/latest)
- [Building MCP Servers Tutorial](https://modelcontextprotocol.io/docs/develop/build-server)

Use the McpServer class from the TypeScript SDK for building MCP servers.
